original_text: Then people went out to see what had happened, and they came to Jesus and found the man from whom the demons had gone, sitting at the feet of Jesus, clothed and in his right mind, and they were afraid.
korean_text: 사람들이 그 이루어진 일을 보러 나와서 예수께 이르러 귀신 나간 사람이 옷을 입고 정신이 온전하여 예수의 발치에 앉아 있는 것을 보고 두려워하거늘

sentences.original_text: Then people went out to see what had happened
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 사람들이 무슨 일이 일어났는지 보러 나갔고

sentences.original_text: and found the man from whom the demons had gone
sitting at the feet of Jesus
clothed and in his right mind
